main.profile_description: Software Developer @Aphelion Ltd | Expert in Python, Power BI and JavaScript | Building Innovative Web Solutions for Scalability and User Excellence.

experiences.title: JUNIOR BUSINESS ANALYST/IT SUPPORT
experiences.description: As a Junior Business Analyst at PROFESSIONAL OUTSOURCING SOLUTIONS LTD, I honed my data analysis and research skills. I collaborated with senior analysts, generated insightful reports. My contributions to cross-functional projects reinforced my passion for data-driven strategies and enhanced my problem-solving skills.

experiences.title: IT SUPPORT TECHNICIAN/SOFTWARE DEVELOPER
experiences.description: As an IT Support Technician at Aphelion Ltd, I delivered essential technical support, resolved IT challenges, and ensured operational stability. As a Developer, I successfully implemented a secure payment system for an e-commerce website. Accomplished in building and enhancing Power BI dashboards for clients, contributed in data cleansing, and proficiently established an enterprise gateway for seamless data refreshing.

experiences.title: SOFTWARE DEVELOPER
experiences.description: As a software developer at Trèfle Applications, I specialize in JavaScript development with expertise in the Vue.js framework. Currently, I'm developing a Commercial Tool to help users managing sales calls and follow up with potential customers effectively. I thrive on the challenge of building innovative solutions that drive success for our team and our customers.
